= Documentation Guidelines =
----

 * Begin the page with a heading in enclosed with: {{{= =}}}
 * The immediate next paragraph should contain a purpose summary of the document
 * Immediately following the purpose summary, is a horizontal line: {{{----}}}, followed by {{{[[TOC(inline)]]}}}, followed by another horizontal line: {{{----}}}
 * All section titles in the rest of the document must use nested heading tags: {{{== ==}}}, {{{=== ===}}}, and so on. 
 * Each section title must be '''preceded''' by a line break {{{[[BR]]}}} and immediately followed by a horizontal line {{{----}}}
 * Python/Seash code snippets must be enclosed with: {{{{{{#!python }}}}}}
